metadata.title: CVE-2020-16118 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In GNOME Balsa before 2.6.0, a malicious server operator or man in themiddle can trigger a NULL pointer dereference and client crash by sending aPREAUTH response to imap_mbox_connect in libbalsa/imap/imap-handle.c.

criterions.comment: balsa package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
